CustomField.description: This setting controls whether the signed agreement is attached to the agreement record as separate PDFs. To stop receiving the signed agreement as a merged PDF, please contact Document Cloud Support.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting controls whether the signed agreement is attached to the agreement record as separate PDFs. To stop receiving the signed agreement as a merged PDF, please contact Document Cloud Support.
CustomField.label: Add Signed PDF as Separate Attachments
